# Anchoring, Greater [synergy] (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
*A single stylized anchor covers the chest of this hulking armor.*

This armor functions as *[[Anchoring (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|anchoring]]* armor, except that it grants a +10 enhancement bonus on ability checks against bull rush, overrun, and trip attacks.

Moderate transmutation (DC 20); Syngergy Prerequisite: [[Anchoring (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|Anchoring]], CL 10th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|bullâ€™s strength]]*; Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** Magic Item Compendium (WotC), pg. 6
